manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Compare: Volume Thin, Fine Hair Good For: Medium hair strengthen+keratin Benefit: Instant thicken hair 6/10 Volume: 5/10 N/A Hold/Memory: 7/10 Thin, Fine Hair Good For: Every length hair strengthen+keratin Benefit: Mega-volume at root 6/10 Volume: 8/10 N/A Hold/Memory: 6/10 Thin, Fine Hair Good For: Fine hair/dry volume strengthen+keratin Benefit: Long-lasting volume 6/10 Volume: 8/10 N/A Hold/Memory: 7/10 Thin, Fine Hair Good For: Thin, Fine Hair strengthen+keratin Benefit: strengthen+keratin 6/10 Volume: 6/10 N/A Hold/Memory: N/A

Complete the Look RODEO STAR Thickening Foam For big, beautiful, bouncy hair. This thickening shampoo adds vitality to fine, flat hair while nourishing and strengthening from root to tip. DALLAS Thickening Conditioner The final step for hair as big as Texas. This thickening conditioner will prolong vitality and enhance shine. DALLAS Thickening Spray Quintessential spray for a mega blow-dry. Great for volume at roots, control at ends and an overall smooth look. Tons of body and shine w/o stiffness. DEATH VALLEY Dry Shampoo The quickest way to get volume and body into your hair. This dry shampoo absorbs extra oil and adds texture for an untamed look.

Product Point of Difference Ingredient conscious formulas with outstanding performance + killer fragrances Our award-winning line of products feature unique ingredients and benefits designed to deliver immediate, high-performing results while keeping hair and scalp health at top-of-mind. All our formulas are color-safe, heat and UV protective, vegan, cruelty and gluten-free, and without harmful ingredients such as parabens, sulfates (SLS or SLES), mineral oil and petrolatum. Good Hair That's Good For the Earth R+Eco/Sustainability We are amping up our commitment to reduce our footprint on earth with the introduction of post-consumer resource (PCR) packaging. We are focused not only on good hair, but also what is good for the planet! Look for the R+Eco logo as we take our commitment one step further by transitioning all R+Co bottles to 55% PCR material. PCR packaging is gathered from domestic US sources AND reduces virgin plastic consumption + decreases the use of fossil fuels and energy used in package manufacturing. 100% Vegan, Gluten + Cruelty-free R+Co Is Leaping-Bunny Certified A well-known certification, Leaping Bunny recognizes brands free of animal testing. ALL YOU NEED IS GOOD HAIR Top hairdressers collaborating on an award-winning product line From new talents to legendary superstars, we consult with those whose skills and influences differ from our own. Whether we work with someone to develop a new product or invite them to speak at one of our happenings, we keep the diversity and range of our collective shifting to reflect an ever-changing world. Perfect playlists for work + play R+Co Talk Radio Listen to our collection of curated sounds by The Collective, beauty + music influencers and other special guests!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptical Expectations turned to Happy Results
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo and conditioner gave me such volume for my baby fine thinner hair! I really am impressed. My hair is shiny and soft and full and stayed that way all day. The scent is very nice too. If you are scent-sensitive, you may not like this really apparent spicy scent but I enjoyed the experience. I ordered the sample to try as I've been disappointed before by shampoo and conditioner claims, but this is one I will definitely re-order in the full size.Lather: Enough lather for me - I'm used to sulfate-free shampoos that don't lather a lot.Rinsing out: The shampoo and conditioner both rinse out easily, and my hair feels thicker in the shower--there is a bit of a 'squeaky clean' feel, and that helps with baby fine hair.Look of hair: Very full and my hair even has some body, which it rarely does. Lots of shine.Feel of hair: soft but not too slippery (baby fine hair can be too slippery sometimes and fall flat). It feels as if I've been to the salon.Very happy with my order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will buy again
reviews.reviewText: Smell is fresh, not overwhelming. Lots of thick suds. Most importantly, makes hair shiny with cleanliness and gives some body. The reason I say some is because I have thin, lifeless gray hair and it is the best shampoo for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write a review, but I had to write to say this shampoo is amazing. I don’t know how, but it works. After only one use, my hair had much more volume. I’ve tried many “volumizing” products in the past, and this is the best by far. Don’t hesitate to buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, smells strong.
reviews.reviewText: Sadly, I really dislike the smell. It has a very 'manly' scent. It does work great though! It leaves my hair light, full, and manageable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick, lustrous, bouncy FULL head of hair ---this shampoo smells incredible and works FANTASTIC!
reviews.reviewText: This thickening shampoo is amazing and smells wonderful. It makes your hair so clean, thick, and lustrous. Yes, it's expensive, but you only need a quarter size in your hand to get a full use. Lathers easily and fills the whole bathroom with a beautiful scent. It makes my hair shiny and bouncy. My hair stays clean and full-looking for up to three days. I was really surprised with how long it actually keeps my hair feeling super clean and super thick. I am excited to try the thickening conditioner, as well as, other products from R+Co. The way I found out about this shampoo line is from a sample pack of thickening shampoo and conditioner that I received 'free' with some perfume samples from a department store in Las Vegas. I was traveling and thought I would try out the sample pack and was blown away with the super high quality so when I got back from vacation, I made sure to search Amazon and found this wonderful full size 8.5 oz bottle. I ordered it through my Prime account with free shipping. I REALLY love this shampoo and encourage others to not think twice about the price. Get your hands on this stellar product; you will be a customer for life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fuller hair but doesn’t look clean
reviews.reviewText: Like other reviewers have stated, it leaves my hair looking sort of greasy or dirty. It doesn’t lather well, but it does make my hair look fuller. I’ve been mixing it half and half in the palm of my hand with another shampoo which seems to work pretty well. It still makes my hair look more full, lathers better & doesn’t look dirty. I will probably look for a different option when it’s gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like it. smells great and adds volume to my fine hair. Would order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was somewhat hesitant to spend as much money on shampoo and conditioner, but I decided to take a chance, and I am so glad I did. This is the first product I have ever purchased for my hair that actually does exactly what it says. My hair is fine and thin and this is truly the best shampoo and conditioner I have ever used and I am 72 years old. When a product really does what it says. I am willing to splurge, and I think I have found my forever products. If you struggle with your fine and thin hair, I highly recommend giving this a try. I do not think you will be sorry. And the 8 ounce bottles are a perfect size for traveling so I can always have this product to use.
